p: The effects of COVID-19 pandemic will be experienced for a long time as not only it has resulted in high mortality but also it will have a huge impact on health as well as the economy. The world has already experienced three coronavirus outbreaks in the past 20â€‰years (SARS-CoV, 2002; MERS, 2012; and SARS-CoV-2, 2019), and the source of these viruses was animals. Bats have been identified as a reservoir of many viruses including SARS-CoV, MERS, Ebola, Rabies, Nipah, and Hendra [ 99]. There is a wide variety of bat species, and they offer a good breeding ground for viruses [ 99]. This suggests that the outbreak so far could be just the tip of an iceberg and that the zoonotic transfers must be carefully monitored.
